metadataAttributes.Title: Cloud Architect using Microsoft Azure
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Meet the growing demand for Azure cloud architects and learn the skills to translate business requirements into technical specifications for reliable, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure using Microsoft Azure.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cloud Cost Policies, Cloud Cost Evaluation, Cloud Cost Optimization, Azure Security Center, Azure Resource Manager, Azure Pricing Calculator, Azure Key Vault, Azure Defender, Privileged Identity Management, Identity and Access Management Fundamentals, Disaster Recovery Plans
